revisions.rev:
{{Infobox NFL season | logo = | team = Saskatchewan Roughriders | year = 2010 | record = '''10â8''' | division_place = '''2nd, West''' | coach = [[Ken Miller (football coach)|Ken Miller]] | general manager = [[Brendan Taman]] | stadium = [[Mosaic Stadium at Taylor Field]] | playoffs = '''Lost in Grey Cup''' | MOP = [[Darian Durant]] | MOC = [[Andy Fantuz]] | MOR = [[Shomari Williams]] | uniform = File:CFL SSK Jersey 2010.png }} The '''[[2010 CFL season|2010]] [[Saskatchewan Roughriders]] season''' was the 53rd season for the team in the [[Canadian Football League]]. The Roughriders attempted to win their 4th [[Grey Cup]] championship, but they lost to the Montreal Alouettes. The Roughriders celebrated their 100th Anniversary this year, which included wearing retro black, silver and red uniforms, having a documentary made of the franchise and having the [[Canadian Mint]] release a specialized Roughrider [[loonie]].{{cite news| url=http://www.cbc.ca/sports/football/story/2010/06/16/sk-loonie.html | work=CBC News | title=Saskatchewan Roughriders loonie approved | date=June 16, 2010}} == Offseason == === Transactions === {| class="wikitable" border="1" |- !
